name: webxploretech
overview:
WebXplore Tech is a fast growing Full Service Web Design and Web Promotion Agency based out of Pune, India with development centers in Ahmedabad, India and marketing tie ups in US, India and Australia. We specialize in search engine friendly Web Design & Development, eCommerce Development, Graphic Design and premium SEO Services, eCommerce Promotion, Internet Branding, PPC, Search Engine Reputation Management, SEO Consulting.

WebXploreTech provides Web services using PHP and Mysql as the programming and backend database on various on the requirement:

1) Web Design and Development 2) Graphics & Multimedia 3) Social Networking 5) E-Commerce Solutions 6) SEO 7) Billing and payments:

  • credit card processing
  • payment gateways integration (AuthorizeNet, Paypal,Googlecheckout, etc.)
  • user subscription management
  • discounts and coupon codes

Our professionals do possess following Skill Sets and Technological Competencies with Expertise Level

Operating System

MS Server 9x/2000/XP/2003 Linux Server

MS SQL Server My SQLI Server Oracle/ Oracle DBA (Advanced) MS Access
